title: my league client won't show champions in champ select and im getting low priority queues

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: all in the title. this is pretty frustrating since im getting punished as well. anyone know how to fix it.  im currently troubleshooting all problems with troubleshoot as shown in the gyazo screenshot but i dont know if it will help.

replies.body:
Your network might be having a hard time grabbing the champion pool data from our servers if the client isn't showing any champs whatsoever. Let's go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make some adjustments to your network settings, and let me know if that get's those champs back where they should be. 

Make sure to try it in a custom or practice game first, and let me know if it doesn't help!
